title: A treatise of death, the last enemy to be destroyed shewing wherein its enmity consisteth and how it is destroyed : part of it was preached at the funerals [sic] of Elizabeth, the late wife of Mr. Joseph Baker ... / by Rich. Baxter ; with some few passages of the life of the said Mrs. Baker observed.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed by R.W. for Nev. Simmons ... and are to be sold by him ... and by Tho. Johnson ...,
notes: Errata on p. [7] at end of section 1.
Advertisements on p. [3]-[14] at end of section 2.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
